title: You Are a Child of Promise
itunes:title: You Are a Child of Promise
description:
If you're feeling abandoned or lonely, you're going to have to stir up your faith in order to overcome those negative feelings. Remind yourself every day, "God knows me. He does care for me. Me and God are a majority. We can do anything but fail."Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
